Great atmosphere and vibe. Professional and friendly staff. Hendrix was great and the spa therapists (Gede and I can’t recall other name). Awesome head and neck massage. Well worth a visit. Wish they were in my country.
Excellent service by Ms. Ella ✨The price quite worth it, nice ambience, and the staff give really nice service!

We popped in on the off chance my husband could get a haircut, close shave and also our 2 year old son to get a haircut. The team were extremely welcoming, he got taken within 5mins. While my son and I waited (toddler remember!) the staff couldn’t of been any friendlier all taking time even as the salon got busier and busier to speak to our little guy who was playing. Hendrix gave my husband a fantastic haircut and shave. Frankie then took his time with my son making sure our son was happy and gave him a fantastic hair cut. Our son sat by himself like a big boy the entire time while Frankie worked.

Booked in for a haircut and shave , “ Bali Big Boss” as they call it. Andrew was great, attention to detail was his thing. It’s definitely worth a visit. The shave and facial massage was so relaxing, it was like he was shaving every individual hair follicle on my face. Super professional and friendly. I’d like to come back next time I’m in Bali.

Was last here in 2017, so was very happy to get a last minute appointment! Mardi is an artistë, who takes his time and pride in his work! A real please! Thank you Mardi! Kadek was awesome as well, very attentive, and pays attention to detail! Thank you Kadek!! Thanks again everyone at Shampoo Lounge! 🕉️

I need it a good hair cut and a shave and I came across the Bali Barber in Nusa Dua when my wife and I went to Bali Collection from some shopping. I walked in and ask if someone could cut my hair they said yes someone was available right away and I got very lucky. I end up with Hendrix and I got spoiled. Not only I end up with an amazing hair cut, the shaving was out of this world! If you need some TLC this is the place for you and ask for Hendrix.

Amazing! The facilities, the products, the service none better in Bali.  I live in Bali and never go anywhere else.  Risa my therapist you are amazing!  Thank you TSL team for a wonderful day and for making my birthday extra special!  Love you guys!
My wife and I went in for some treatments during our stay at the Sofitel nusa dua. Suwati treated me like a celebrity, well worth a visit when I’m town!

Came here with my husband, 9yo step son and 4yo daughter. I will do the boys reviews on The Bali Barber.... in short they look amazing!!!I booked in advance for a haircut and my daughter got the princess hair spa.As soon as you arrive the staff are fabulous and make you feel at home.I was given a hair wash prior to having my haircut, that has to be the best thing about a haircut. After the cut it was blow dried and then styled. Hairdresser Agus was fantastic and did a great job. My daughter was with a spa therapist (I cannot recall her name) who took amazing care of her. She was put in a mini sarong, given a hair wash, head massage with the hair mask and then a shoulder and arm massage whilst the mask was sitting. My daughter took the 'princess' part literally as she wanted the 'Elsa' treatment, so the lady then braided her hair at the end like Elsa.

Went at 2030 pm was promplty served by 'Hendrix'. Had my beard trimmed and edges done with a razor. Was amazing service with hot and cold towel face wash, face scrub and massage, attention to detail was like never had before and all for an amazing price. Highly recommended for shave or haircut. Great location.

When I just walked in today I couldn’t imagine in my best dreams how happy I would walk out of this gorgeous hairsalon tonight! The very friendly and professional staff especially Yuki, are true artists and managed to create the perfect color cut and extensions! I can only highly recommend their service!

Have received two hair cuts and beard grooming by Frank. He masters the scissor and trimmer like no other hairdresser. Franks attention to detail is impressive and I am extremely happy with the results. Great, kind and professional staff. Pedicures and manicures are also very nice, and I can also recommend this service. Very very good value for money! Suksema TSL!
Manis and Merry did mine and my sisters nails. They were very friendly, organised and hardworking. Would go back.

My barber Alan was polite, friendly and attentive to details. There was a feeling that he was working on a masterpiece, although it's really just your head. You get a wash before and after the cut, and a complimentary head rub and shoulder massage which was so badly needed. I'm definitely going back there when I'm next in Bali.

I went to the shampoo lounge in the Sofitel Hotel. Was an amazing experience from the minute I walked through the door to when I left. Liza, Sri and Rudy were all exceptionally professional and accommodating. Would definitely return here on my next visit.

I had a wonderful experience there! I had my hair "UP" for a wedding!  My grand daughter had her hair curled and her nails manicured! My friend had her hair cut and styled! The atmosphere was professional yet really friendly! I would highly recommend this Salon!
Thanks to Erlina and Merry for the beautiful manicure and pedicure. You did a fantastic job. A lovely way to spend a couple of hours. 💖
The ladies and gents at the salon were so kind and friendly and were able to colour and cut my hair exactly the way I requested. Wonderful staff

No need to go anywhere else! Highly recommend the 4-hand massage for two hours daily! Used thier services for 12 weeks to unwind daily and every time I went the place all I saw was warm freindly faces very customer focused.  These young talented massage professionals are a gift. When visting one must show them appreciation by tipping them accordingly, unfortunately too many Westerns don't think that's imporatnat yet it surely is becuase that's how they support their families.
The staff and service we received was outstanding, could not have been a better visit!  Such a pleasure!

I was actually walking around doing some shopping when I saw Bali Refresh Spa. I quickly check Tripadvisor, and I know this is the place for a massage.  Thank you to all the previous reviewers, you are right!  Where can you get an hour of massage for less than $20!  This is not a fancy place, but it's clean, quiet , and private rooms.  The lady at the front was friendly, I asked for a discount, and she gave it to me. What I saved, I added to the tips to the person who gave me the massage.  She did every inch of my body. I felt so good afterward.  Thank you

My partner and I have had a few treatments at Bali Refresh Spa and every one has been superb. Very friendly staff, beautiful rooms and excellent massages, foot spas and hair cream baths. Their treatments make you feel so relaxed and they take time to do an amazing job. Best spa ever!

When in Nusa Dua you must visit the Bali refresh spa, came here regularly on our 10 day trip.  Fantastic massage, very clean and great prices, they even do pick up and drop off to hotel! Thanks ladies

Fantastic, happy staff and best massage in Nusa Dua! Being a big person I need lots of massage and these ladies deliver one of the best deep tissue massages I’ve had in years 😘 Guarantee I will return every visit to Bali ❤️

We traveled for 4 weeks around bali and tried several massage spas here but this one is by far one of the best. The staff is super nice and always smiley. The store is clean and has a welcoming energy. You instantly feel relaxed. We always got a delicious welcome drink and a cold refreshing towel. We usually did the foot massages which is amazing, but beside of that i can really recommend the hot stone massage as well! The prices are fair and all together you get a really relaxing experience.

This place caught my eye from the street, so decided to give it a try and so glad we did, we never went anywhere else after that. Staff are friendly and do fantastic massages, the facial was also lovely. Welcome drink and cold towel on arrival which is a blessing 🙏 Rooms are very clean as are toilets and facilities. Free bottled water also available. Sandy was fantastic doing massage as were all the girls and Tuti manager is friendly and welcoming. Also free wifi and free transport for Nusa Dua area although we didn't use this, I will be doing one of the extended packages next time !! We will defiantly be back 💆🏻‍♀️

During my stay in Nusa Dua, my husband and I went to "Bali refresh Spa" every day. We loved all the massages, the place is very clean and nice, relaxing music, professional masseurs. Would definitely recommend this spa. They have pick up and drop off from your hotel too. We enjoyed massages from Widi and Sandy but I think most of the masseurs are great.

Was Totally Disappointed worst massage I've had since I've been in Bali my therapist was uninterested in her job, I think they found her on the beach giving treatments,because she was terrible ,I would not recommend going here what so ever,and for the quality of treatment definitely not worth the money,if I could give a lower rating I would

Found this place on trip advisor and we were able to get an appointment within the hour. They even picked us up from our hotel!  I went for the Massage and Mani + Pedi package. Quick shout out the Iluh (she gave me the best massage) and the manager (sorry, I forgotten her name but I’ve added their photo). They were super friendly and made my experience very special.

During my stay in Nusa Dua, I went to Bali refresh spa almost every day, tried deep tissue massage, facial, shiatsu, foot reflexology. Loved all the massages, the place is very clean and nice, relaxing music, professional masseurs. Would definitely recommend this spa.

Very nice SPA & Massage place with cozy rooms & highly professional service! Been at this place almost every day of my stay, trying different programs, enjoyed a lot deep tissue massage & slimming massage programs, that really worked well on my body! Highly recommended place!

We went to Bali refresh based on the good reviews on TripAdvisor but we were sorely disappointed. There were 11 of us and they didn't have enough massuers so we waited. Then they ushered us to nearby small parlour which were dirty and gross. Some of us went to Kristina spa nearby which was much better. Won't go back to Bali refresh again.
I had a 2 hour package with Santi.Cream bath and balinese massage. Could not fault it. Lovely technique

We had several treatments in this soa. My wife liked her facial but was less impressed with the neck back and shoulder massage, Balinese massage was a bit hard. What was nice was the aroma massage, very relaxing.Clean spacious treatment rooms.Friendly staff.

We stayed at a resort in Nusa Dua and obviously didn't want to pay the prices of the resort's spa for a good massage.  I had read the great reviews about Bali Refresh and we weren't disappointed.  Even better when we discovered how close it was to our resort!  My husband had a 2 hour Balinese body massage while I had 1.5 hours Balinese body massage then a 1/2 hour foot massage.  Both of our therapists were excellent, very professional and the massages were fantastic.  The spa is very clean with a nice ambience, good a/c and they provide a cold towel and welcome drink on arrival. We tried another spa in Tanjung Benoa for massage and one in Seminyak when we went for the day, and Bali Refresh was far superior in every way.  It cost just over $70 for both of us to have 2 hours each - absolutely brilliant for the high quality of the massage.  Highly recommended and will definitely go back next time we are in Nusa Dua!

I discovered bali refresh spa in 2018 when i came to bali for the first time and stayed in Nusa Dua. I was so shocked by the prices and the quality or the massages that I had to bring my partner back who hates massages. He fell in love with the place. Im now here second time in Bali, 2019, staying in Nusa Dua,and have literally been going me and my partner every second day for hour massages. I've also had the sunburn treatment done which worked wonders as i was fried like a tomato, but the next day all the pain and redness was gone after that treatment I also had my pedicure done which came out so perfectly. The fact that they offer free transportation if you're in the nusa dua area makes it so easy to WhatsApp them 15 mins prior and say you would like to come down. So simple, so easy, the girls are great, the prices are amazing,and I highly recommend this place, it's hard not to go back!

We stayed at the Novotel in Nusa Dua and was not prepared to pay resort prices for a massage.  Found a local spa only 5 minutes walk.  Clean, professional and relaxing.  Went as a walk in and was lucky enough to get right it.  The ladies were very good and the treatments were among the best we have had and we tend to get a massage wherever we are in the world on holiday.  Can not argue with the prices, so no renegotiating is needed.  Facilities were excellent, we had a shower afterwards no rush. Very attentive to our needsWe will be back!

My husband and I are visiting Bali for a quality relaxation trip. While we hesitated to pay the resort price for a massage, we also didn’t want to settle for a street side/beach but style massage either. For the equivalent $36 AUD (360,000IDR) we were able to get an hour each full body Balinese massage including cool tea and face cloth on arrival. The whole spa was clean and very well air conditioned, and the massage was fantastic! The one hour includes head, neck/shoulders, back, arms, hands, legs, feet and glutes, chest and even a cute tummy massage perfect for after an indulgent hotel buffet breakfast. Foot bath included, no sneaky add ons for fragrances oils unlike in other places. The whole room smelled of jasmine. I’ll be back tomorrow for a pedi, Hot stone and maybe a deep tissue too. Can’t wait to go back.

We went here to try out their sunburn treatment, they started off with 15 min massage before covering our body with yogurt and aloe vera mixture. The massage was great towards the end of the treatment, they provided towels for us to wash off the yogurt. It was refreshing and would come back here again to try their massage. Price is cheaper than a few other places in the same vicinity.

We were staying in a fancy hotel in the area, but thought the spa prices were too expensive. This spa was very close to our hotel, and we went here three times. Great massages! All the (little older) ladies were super! Really great. We had a traditional bali massage and a deep tissue one and a foot reflex massage. All really great. Prices are much better here and absolutely worth it. Wifi in the building. There are a view options in the street that are a little cheaper but ths one was very nice.
My family and I had one of the best massage here. Desak was really friendly and welcoming with us. I recommend you to try it. Thank to staff for their work!Sivia

Fantastic massage and spa/beauty service. Great value, clean and professional. Our whole family visited multiple times during our stay. Very accommodating, even when we booked 8 people in!! Thanks for making our holiday so relaxing.
A 2 hour hot stone and oil massage combination. Very clean and private. Talented therapist and respectful. The spa offers a pick up and drop off service to the local hotels.
Awesome friendly staff and great massage 💆‍♂️ desak is lovely. Free transport too and from the shop. Tea ☕️ before and refreshing cool bottled water after Thank you 🙏 will be back in August.
We got told about this spa and it was average. The rooms were hot tho, air con didn’t work great. Prices are ok.  Didn’t get offered any water like most spas
awesome experience here with the love duet massage! my group of friends came here after we landed and our experience was seamless, a must try for anyone visiting Bali!
Found this place, gave it a shot and love it! Friends and I  came out after our 180 mins of bali love duet package feeling refreshed. Give it a try !

We needed a massage badly and we found this place from tripadvisor. We gave it a shot by delivering our bodies to the masseuses. We came out after our 180 mins of bali love duet package feeling brand new. Voila!
We gave this place a shot by delivering our bodies to the masseuses. Our virgin Bali trip was amazing because of this massage.We did the love duet package and it was entirely worthwhile.

I had a beautiful full body massage and a hair cream bath. It was 2 hours of bliss with lovely staff. They open until 10:00pm so it was a great way to end a busy day. I highly recommend a visit!. For all of this we only paid  $35 AUD.

My wife and I used this spa exclusively while in Bali this time. The place is welcoming, clean and the massages are excellent. I’ve saved the link on my iPad desktop as we’ll come back next time we are in Bali.They provide a free transport to and from the spa from our Nusa Dua hotel. Highly recommended 😃😃

Great little place that is reasonably priced ($13au for 1 hr reflexology) nusa dua is more expensive for massages so this is reasonable for the area. Had a mani and pedicure for au $28 which was great!

This is my second visit to Refresh spa. Had an awesome massage so good till I fell asleep.The staff were very nice makes you feel welcome.Spa was very clean. I return next day to do a Balinese  massage and a facial by the same  masseuse. She was really good. makes you want to return. The spa was very clean

This place is clean and the staff is very friendly and they know how to give a good massage:) A bit more expensive then other places but it’s worth it. Been here two times and are planning going back as long as we are staying in Nusa Dua! Vey happy that we found this spa!
I visited today for a hot stone massage. Absolutely awesome. Nice clean spa, friendly staff. Planning on visiting again.

3 hours very well spent. We were greeted by the lovely Komong Neko and were treated by Widi and Widia, two lovely ladies who certainly know their trade! Both my husband and I (his first ever massage) left feeling both relaxed and refreshed. Would certainly recommend to anyone. Thank you lovely ladies 😊

Fabulous treatment from start to finish. Both left feeling relaxed revitalised, skin feels really smooth, would definitely recommend 3hrs well spent and special thanks to the staff who looked after us so well.

Highly recommend Bali Refresh Spa if you are staying in Nusa Dua. The spa is very clean and a relaxing environment. The people are so friendly! We’ve been twice so far in the three days we’ve been in Nusa Dua and are planning on going again at least another two times in the four days we have left (hopefully we can squeeze in a third time). They also offer a free transfer service - we haven’t used it but others that were at the spa did ... such a great value add!

Went here recently with my partner, he had foot reflexology and I had manicure and pedicure. Staff were warm and welcoming and very efficient. Cool towel and drink on arrival. Very relaxing place to visit if in Nusa Dua.
The place looks old and run down . But massage is good . Can go if not fussy people . Price is very reasonable and have free transport and whatsapp contact

I came to Refresh for a Balinese massage and it was wonderful! Beautiful massage room and wonderful masseuse.  I usually just get 60 minutes but I opted for 90 minutes because I was very knotted up from planes and carrying luggage, etc It was lovely and they also pick you up and bring you back to your homestay or hotel. Highly recommend.  The prices are very reasonable too!
Just had the couples three our spa experience. Was fantastic will be here every day of our trip! Very clean good masseuse.

This place is brilliant, we have been twice so far and will be returning every day until we leave. Previously we had only had resort spa massages and to be honest, aside from the decor, the quality of massage was basically the same. My partner has had the four hand massage, and I have had both shiatsu and balinese massage. All have been amazing.Highly highly recommend. So cheap too, we have been paying $40-$70AUD for two people for 90 mins each.

I visited this Spa every day for the 22 days we were in Nusa Dua. The staff were extremely friendly and looked after me by giving me the BEST massages (I have been to Bali MANY times and know a good massage when I get one). I love so many of the staff but want to especially mention Ayu and Wayan for massages and Desak and the other receptionists....don't know names. Thank you all. I will be back some day.

Thanks bali refresh for the good experience. Friendly and accommodating staff who helped us arrange for free transport to and from the hotel. Good value for money and decent facilities. Definitely recommended.

Came to this place because of good recent reviews in tripadvisor. I did not expect anything fancy, just wanted to have a good massage to unwind; but it turned out to be a waste of time. The therapist assigned was lack of training, most of the times did a random massage, no pressure applied even after telling her about it. She basically rubbed the massage oil all over the body with no purpose. Appreciate the discount given after telling the front staff about my bad experience. They really need to pay more attention to the service offered in order to maintain the performance.

We are so happy to have come here for massage and have our nails done.Wish we have found this place earlier and most certainly we would come every day.Reasonable prices and very attentive service.very good staff and tracking environment.Big bonus the free transfer from and to the hotel .Good job!!

Our family of six each had two hour massages yesterday.  They were very good and would definately recommend them if you are here.  We liked it so much that we went back today for another two hour massage. The massages are very good and very reasonable. If you are looking for luxury surroundings stick to massages in your hotel at a much higher cost but if you want a very good massage for a very reasonable price come here.
